profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.4 Transparency - SMask
profile.description: If an SMask key appears in an ExtGState dictionary, its value shall be None
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: If an SMask key appears in an ExtGState dictionary, its value shall be None

error.message: An ExtGState contains SMask key with a value other than None
